import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import Logo from '../images/logo.svg' const Dashboard = (props) => { const user = localStorage.getItem('user_id') const [userState, setUserState] = useState(user) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:4000/users/${user}`) .then(response => setUserState(response.data)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) }, [state]) return(

Elizabeth Wilkinson

Course Creator

COURSES

{userState}👋

Let's get started!

Select a course below to start adding content to it. When you’re finished, simply close your browser or log out. Don’t forget to save your work as you go!

COURSE LANGUAGE OBJECTIVES ACTIVITES LAST EDITED
Elementary Spanish Spanish 3 3 August 4 2020 EDIT
Elementary Farsi Farsi 13 16 June 29 2020
Elementary Latin Latin 11 20 Yesterday
) } export default Dashboard;
